name: David D. RICHARDSON, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Department of Corrections, John E. Wetzel, Secretary, Appellee

parties: David D. RICHARDSON, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Department of Corrections, John E. Wetzel, Secretary, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of February, 2015, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
110 A.3d 994
David D. RICHARDSON, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Department of Corrections, John E. Wetzel, Secretary, Appellee.
